ValidationRule.description: Required for changing the stage from 'Presentation' to 'Quote' CCRM-41 ,Updated via CCRM-2128. The Sales process has changed to have Quote , so the validation rule has been updated, Updated for CCRM-3500, Updated for CCRM-3413.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( $RecordType.Name = "Technology", ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Negotiation"), CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "GSS NA"), (ISBLANK( Amount ) || ISBLANK( CloseDate ) || ISBLANK( ExpectedRevenue ) || ISBLANK( Demo_Completed_Date__c ) || Decision_Maker_Present__c = FALSE || Decision_Maker_Agreement__c = FALSE ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: In order to move out of Stage “Presentation”, you must fill out the following fields: Amount, Expected Revenue, Demo Completed Date, Decision Maker Present, Decision Maker Agreement
